text: 8:11 Aposel 2:24; 1 Korin 3:16; 6:14; 2 Korin 4:14; Efesus 2:5Godɨn Duam Iesus mozimɨn a gamizɨ a ua dɨkafi, ezɨ Duar kamra, ian navir averiabar aven iti. Egh gumazir Krais gamizɨ a dɨkavizir kam, a ian ovengamin mɨkarzibar amutɨ, da ua dɨkavigh angamɨra ikiam. God uan Duar ian navir averiabar aven itimɨn tuavimɨn, bizir kam damuam.
